name: tv-automation-quantel-gateway
description: CORBA to REST gateway for Quantel/ISA playback

scripts.cleancache: yarn cache clean atem-connection atem-state casparcg-connection casparcg-state superfly-timeline
scripts.unlink:all: yarn unlink atem-connection & yarn unlink atem-state & yarn unlink casparcg-connection & yarn unlink casparcg-state & yarn unlink superfly-timeline
scripts.build: trash dist && node-gyp build && yarn build:main
scripts.test: yarn lint && yarn build && yarn unit
scripts.release: yarn reset && yarn testci && yarn docs:publish && yarn changelog
scripts.license-validate: node-license-validator -p -d --allow-licenses MIT BSD BSD-2-Clause BSD-3-Clause ISC Apache Unlicense WTFPL GPL GPL-2.0-or-later --allow-packages cycle
scripts.types-build: cd src/types && trash dist && yarn build:main && cd ../..
scripts.types-test: cd src/types && yarn lint && yarn unitci && cd ../..
scripts.types-ci: cd src/types && yarn lint && yarn unitci && cd ../..

scripts-info.installclean: Remove yarn.lock, cleare yarn cache, and reinstall
scripts-info.build:main: Builds main build command without trash.
scripts-info.unit: Build the library and run unit tests
scripts-info.test: Lint, build, and test the library
scripts-info.watch: Watch source files, rebuild library on changes, rerun relevant tests
scripts-info.cov: Run tests, generate the HTML coverage report, and open it in a browser
scripts-info.docs: Generate HTML API documentation and open it in a browser
scripts-info.docs:test: Running the docs generation for testing.
scripts-info.docs:json: Generate API documentation in typedoc JSON format
scripts-info.docs:publish: Generate HTML API documentation and push it to GitHub Pages
scripts-info.changelog: Bump package.json version, update CHANGELOG.md, tag a release
scripts-info.release: Clean, build, test, publish docs, and prepare release (a one-step publish process). Updates versions and creates git commits.
scripts-info.reset: Delete all untracked files and reset the repo to the last commit
scripts-info.ci: Test script for running by the CI (CircleCI)
scripts-info.validate:dependencies: Scan dependencies for vulnerabilities and check licenses
scripts-info.watch-server: Run HTTP server and restart when changes are made.
